summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley, discussing a link to a New York Times article. The email emphasizes the confidentiality of the communication and suggests it may contain privileged information. It also includes a warning against unauthorized use or disclosure.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, indicating the communication is confidential and may contain privileged information.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of the email from Jeffrey Epstein, suggesting a professional relationship.

connections.description: Jeffrey Epstein is communicating with Jes Staley, indicating a professional relationship.

keyFacts: The email emphasizes confidentiality and potential attorney-client privilege.
The communication is intended solely for the use of Jes Staley.
Unauthorized use or disclosure of the email content is prohibited.
The email contains a link to a New York Times article.
The email was sent on December 19, 2009.
